amendment.description: To require an independent report on the efforts of the National Nuclear Security Administration to understand the aging of plutonium in nuclear weapons.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3284 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3284 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To require an independent report on the efforts of the National Nuclear Security Administration to understand the aging of plutonium in nuclear weapons.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3284 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3284 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
